comments: Two numbers a and b are called irrational unitary-phi amicable numbers if they satisfy uphi(a)=uphi(b)=2*(a^2-b^2)^(1/2) where if x=Product p(i)^r(i) then uphi(x)=Product (p(i)^r(i)-1) (A047994).Factorizations: 2^4*3^2*5*37, 2^4*3^3*13*5*37, 2^5*3^2*31*5*37, 2^5*3^3*13*31*5*37, ...
author: _Yasutoshi Kohmoto_
